gobblin.yarn

Class GobblinHelixTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.yarn.GobblinHelixTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.helix.task.Task

    public class GobblinHelixTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.helix.task.Task
    An implementation of Helix's Task that wraps and runs one or more Gobblin Tasks.

    Upon startup, a GobblinHelixTask reads the property GobblinYarnConfigurationKeys.WORK_UNIT_FILE_PATH for the path of the file storing a serialized WorkUnit on the FileSystem of choice and de-serializes the WorkUnit. Depending on if the serialized WorkUnit is a MultiWorkUnit, it then creates one or more Gobblin Tasks to run the WorkUnit(s) (possibly wrapped in the MultiWorkUnit) and waits for the Gobblin Task(s) to finish. Upon completion of the Gobblin Task(s), it persists the TaskState of each Task to a file that will be collected by the GobblinHelixJobLauncher later upon completion of the job.
